prompt: Edit the uploaded photo. PRESERVE: Face identity 100% identical — all features unchanged. Eyelashes and eyebrows exactly as original. SKIN: Remove minor blemishes, natural texture, slightly shiny. Add soft freckles. ADD: Daisies of different sizes placed on the face — scattered randomly for a natural, realistic look. Flowers must have proper petal detail, natural colors, realistic shadows on skin. BACKGROUND: Clean beautiful white. QUALITY: Preserve original color correction, no filters. Sharp focus. Original dimensions.
